mapper.insert:
insert into account(fintech_use_num, account_alias, bank_code_std, bank_name, account_num_masked, account_holder_name, account_type) values
(#{li.fintech_use_num}, #{li.account_alias}, #{li.bank_code_std}, #{li.bank_name}, #{li.account_num_masked}, #{li.account_holder_name}, #{li.account_type})
